text: Hey, how's it going tonight?
Very Well, How about you?
Ok, here too. I'd like to talk to you about children who are less fortunate. Do you have a moment?
Yes, please go ahead and tell me
How do you feel about people who just born unlucky?
I feel sorry for them and would like to help them as much as possible
I see I got a really kind person to talk to. That's great.
Go ahead and tell me how can I help
I'm glad you're so welling to help, but I would feel bad just to get your help without letting you know what the organization is about.
Sure, please tell me about the organization
It's an organization called Save the Children. Have you heard of them?
I think I have
They are an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
that is very good to know
Yes. Just recently, not sure if you've heard of it, they are working on reuniting children who were separated from their parents at the Mexico-US border.
Thats such a noble thing they are doing
They are very noble. They're helping kids worldwise but also very close to home. Would you like to help by donating?
Sure, I would like to help. How much is the average donation
They get anything from $0.50 to $2 from mturk workers.
I would like to to donate $1.00 as a mturk worker
